Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2012...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 6/9/2013 (Going to HOU: C E. Llamas, P L. McCullers, P J. Weaver. Going to PIT: P J. McLovin)...
Traded from Houston to Baltimore on 3/2/2015 (Going to HOU: CF A. Cook. Going to BAL: P L. McCullers)...
Injured on 7/13/2018 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 9 weeks...
Released by Baltimore on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 6/16/2020 to a minor league deal...
Earned first career win on 6/17/2020...
Had first career hit on 9/2/2020, off Ronald Maag (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/2023, off Dan Navarro (ARI)...
Injured on 8/13/2023 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
